Fields - application key id, must start from "U_" for user application
Support application subfields:
> "path" - path to application (Required for user apps. Support apps only from userspace)
> "param" - "string" or "array of string" of params for application (Optional, can set only for user apps)
> "title" - user friendly application title (Required for user apps)
> "icon" - icon name in theme or object path (Optional)
> "focused icon" - name of icon with focus in theme or object path (Optional)
> "visible" - show application in application list (Optional) ("1" as default) (user can change only on "0" for PB-applications)
Support fields values type:
> "string value" - end value
> "object path" - end value { "path": "<path on user space>" }
Examples:
1) "U_MyApp": {
     "path": "applications/my_app.app", 
     "param": ["-a", "25"],
     "title": "My application",
     "icon": { "path": "applications/icons/my_app_icon.bmp" },
     "focused_icon": "desktop_app_calc_f.bmp"
   }
2) "PB_Calc": {
     "title": "User calculator",
     "icon": { "path": "applications/icons/my_calc_icon.bmp" },
     "focused_icon": { "path": "applications/icons/my_calc_icon_f.bmp" }
   }
end.

"groups" - array of application groups
Element of groups array support:
> "title" - title of group (Required)
> "apps" - array of applications (Optional)
> "sort" - applications sort type ("title", "fixed" or special property of applications) (Optional, "title" by default)
end.
